newsitem.title: USA: Enzon gets $2.5 mln in milestone payments.
newsitem.headline: Enzon gets $2.5 mln in milestone payments.

text.p: Enzon Inc said Monday Schering-Plough Corp advanced the company's anti-cancer agent PEG-INTRON A to Phase III clinical trials in the U.S. and Europe, entitling Enzon to $2.5 million in milestone payments.

Enzon said it and Schering-Plough have a licensing agreement for the ani-cancer and anti-viral agentt, which is a longer-acting form of Schering-Plough's INTRON A. The deal entitles Enzon to $5.5 million in milestone payments, of which it now receives $2.5 million.
